title: Sissy Chateau, A Graphic Novel
description: Leslie, a sissy in transformation to womanhood, is from a family of great wealth and power. She likes to play a game by herself that involves rope and the friction it creates. But when you are tied up in the Sissy Ch√¢teau, you are vulnerable to the ministrations of the servants that are supposed to be at your command. All artwork is drawn by the author in colored pencil.
author: Maitresse P.
